txt.en: 'The kergrim and Angmarim seek to control the tombs in Akhaldar창g, but neither of them must be allowed to win the contest! Each group is vile in its own way, but the kergrim turn my stomach. Defeat as many as you can, and keep them from feasting upon the fallen!'
Kergrim can be found throughout the Pit of Stonejaws.

'You have slain many kergrim? Good work, [placeholder]! I think kergrim may be my least-favourite of the creatures that dwell beneath the mountains. Aye, even worse than Orcs! That's how much I dislike the vile creatures!'
Defeated kergrim in the Pit of Stonejaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Kyrstig has asked you to stop the kergrim from consuming the dwarf-corpses in the Akhaldar창g tombs.
Defeat kergrim in the Pit of Stonejaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
